paper_abstract: We here propose a polynomial-time deterministic finite automaton minimization algorithm directly derived from Brzozowski's double reversal algorithm. To do so, we take into account the framework by Brzozowski and Tamm, to propose an atomization algorithm that allows us to achieve polynomial time complexity. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A polynomial double reversal minimization algorithm for deterministic finite automata
